attributes.action: Publish ordnance survey maps on the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax payers are paying for OS maps to be made. At the same time the very maps we pay for are being sold back to us. I suggest that the information should be openly published (via the internet).

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Free-UK-Map-Data/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
